arts.ttl: Tomáš Čvančara's last-gasp header secures dramatic win for Borussia Moenchengladbach against Union Berlin
arts.sum: Tomáš Čvančara's 96th-minute header gave Borussia Mönchengladbach a dramatic 1-0 victory over Union Berlin, ending their seven-month winless run at home in the Bundesliga. The match began with Union Berlin showing more attacking intent, Benedict Hollerbach forcing an early save from Moritz Nicolas.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Union Berlin preview: Hosts in need of a win
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach host Union Berlin at Borussia Park this weekend, with the hosts in need of a win after a tough run of fixtures to begin their 2024/25 campaign.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
